title: Saksit Vegetarian Restaurant - maybe closed
description: Buffet restaurant where most dishes consist of curries, vegetable stir frys, noodle, soup, rice, and others. Large indoor seating area. Owner speaks English. It is on the small street that runs off of Suthep Road next to the Suan Dok Temple complex; not inside the compound. English sign out front. NOTE: Apr 2014 reported maybe closed/shut, please verify and let happycow know!
